NP_p0900_ME05_10050_HAT: Just remember, Legions only have so many Ability slots—and you can't equip an Ability if you don't have enough open.
NP_p0900_ME08_10040_HAT: You even get a little reward for every order you complete. Not bad, huh?
NP_p0900_0203_10210_HAT: All good on the Legatus Menu? Well, I'll be here if you want to bone up.
NP_p0900_ME04_00030_HAT: Equipped skills are shown on the left, with unused skills listed in the center.
NP_p0900_0202_10010_BIL: An emergency briefing, huh? Guess those bastards are at it again.
NP_p0900_0203_10010_DOC:
I see you have a mission.
Have everything you need?
NP_p0900_0401_10010_TED: Playin' twenty questions with civvies, huh? I guess you won't be needing any of my toys this time...
NP_p0900_0800_00120_HAT: Still, there are a lot of loose ends. Why don't you go help tie them up?
NP_p0900_0400_00020_OPE: Hopefully you can shed some light on that. Good luck!
NP_p0900_0300_10020_BIL: I can't believe the commander still lets one of those... things around here, after what happened to the captain.
NP_p0900_0901_00010_OPE: And, well, you're the only one who can stop her now. We're all counting on you.
NP_p0900_0600_00010_E00: Heading out on patrol, buddy? I've got a fresh, tuned-up bike with your name on it!
NP_p0900_0600_00010_RIC: I won't lie to you, I'm jealous that you've got a Legion! I hope I'll get to use this terminal, too, someday.
NP_p0900_0500_00020_TAB: Jena gave me an idea... What about a weapon fused with your body? Cool, right?
NP_p0900_0203_00210_DOC:
Looks like you're all prepared.
Go make the commander proud.
NP_p0900_0600_10120_TED:
Don't let your guard down for a second.
I know I don't have to tell you that, but I will anyway.
NP_p0900_ME06_10010_HAT: Want to know about the Reorganize tab? Sure, why not.
NP_p0900_0300_10020_ALA: Pfft, how new ARE you? How can you not know who Marie is? Man, where is she...
NP_p0900_0501_00040_JOE: C'mon, Sarah, chill! It's just Lappy!
NP_p0900_0500_10010_ROY: I heard that Jena transformed her arm into a blade. Is that true?
NP_p0900_0400_10030_TAB: Swing by again if you have time before heading out! See ya.
NP_p0900_0201_00010_E00:
Hey, I'm not just spinning my wheels here!
Gotta make sure these mean machines are all green!
NP_p0900_0202_00010_MIK: I'd better get to the command room. You too, huh?
NP_p0900_0301_00040_ALA: Not that I need it, but it's good enough for you.
NP_p0900_0500_00020_AVE:
But that Jena, huh? What even is she?!
Whatever she is, we'll definitely get her next time!
NP_p0900_0501_10010_KIJ: Hello, Lappy. I don't see you around here often. What is it?
NP_p0900_0500_10020_JOE: If it's not a chimera, that means we can fight it too, right? I better hit the range.
NP_p0900_0201_00010_RIC: You can barely tell whether you're dealing with a chimera in the first place without a Legion.
NP_P0900_0290_00020_HAT: I'm Shinjiro Hattori, part of the Neuron tech crew. I designed the menu in your new Legatus.
NP_p0900_0900_00010_KAY: If all goes according to plan, this is your last showdown with Jena, huh? Be sure you take plenty of items.
NP_p0900_0400_00010_OPE: Jena's been missing for twenty years. Why is she showing up now?
NP_p0900_0300_10010_BIL: You, huh... Sorry about your dad.
NP_p0900_0901_00020_OPE: There's a bike you can use in the garage. Break a leg!
NP_p0900_0500_00010_TAB: I heard there's a new beastie running around out there. A big one, too. Sounds like time for an upgrade.
NP_P0900_0290_00140_JOE: Sure, Sarah, I'm sure he won't mind if you ask a question.
NP_p0900_0900_00210_TED: I know you can handle her on your own, but what's the fun in that? Come back if you decide you want a little extra bang.
NP_p0900_0900_10010_TED: Heh heh, I knew you'd drop by. I've got some fun stuff for you to show Jena.
NP_p0900_0401_10020_TED: These babies play a little too rough for your average human.
NP_p0900_0800_00110_HAT: Won't say all's well that ends well, but it's starting to calm down all over.
NP_p0900_0700_10210_HAT: Alright then, off you go! We're counting on you.
NP_P0900_0290_10030_E00: I guess that makes us peas in a pod! See you 'round, buddy!
NP_p0900_1200_10210_HAT: No problem, just let me know if you need something.
NP_p0900_ME07_00040_HAT: Any time you're curious about how you're doing, take a look at your Status and find out.
NP_p0900_0501_10020_KIJ:
Ah, you're solving everyone's problems.
Well, I'm problem-free at the moment.
NP_p0900_0500_00010_AVE:
So Akira's going to be okay? Fantastic!
Me? I'm fine! Full of energy, like always!
NP_p0900_0201_00020_RIC: That's why I need you to be my eyes out there, okay? I'm looking forward to reading your report.
NP_P0900_0290_10030_RIC: Of course, I'm also very interested in your Legion.
NP_P0900_0290_00010_HAT:
Hm? Never seen you before...
Oh, you're one of the new rookies. Sorry about that.
NP_p0900_0800_10010_KIJ: I hear there's a pretty big mess to clean up. I'll be here trying to track Jena's whereabouts. Good luck.
NP_p0900_0500_10010_JOE: Yo, did you really go one-on-one with that huge-ass monster?
NP_p0900_0300_10010_ALA:
So you woke up, huh?
Too bad. Your Legion would have been mine.
NP_p0900_0600_10110_TED: What's wrong with me? It's starting to feel weird when monsters AREN'T terrorizing the city...
NP_p0900_ME06_10020_HAT: There you can change the placement of your Legions on the main Legion screen.
NP_p0900_1200_10030_E00: They're finally moving me up to full-time maintenance crew! Best news I've had all week!
NP_p0900_1200_00010_HAT: Look at you, saving the world! Anything a little guy like me can help you with?
NP_p0900_0501_00070_JOE: Aw, I'm just messin' with you, Sarah! But think about it. What if the fire department had their own Lappy? Or the medics?
NP_p0900_0500_10020_ROY: What on earth was she up to over the last couple decades...?
NP_p0900_0700_00010_HAT: Going to help take out that monster, huh? How about a refresher before you leave?
NP_p0900_1200_10030_ALI:
"Alicia! The damn thing disappeared again!"
... Man, I sure miss that big lug.
NP_p0900_0202_10110_JOE:
She says, you hear the call, get moving!
Damn, Sarah, what's with the attitude all of a sudden?
NP_p0900_0700_00210_DOC:
Well, it couldn't hurt.
Good luck.
NP_p0900_0300_00010_MIK: Up and about already, huh? That's great!
NP_p0900_0501_00010_SHI: Ah, Lappy... Would you like a tarot reading?
NP_P0900_0290_00030_MIT: They brought me into Neuron because I have potential to use a Legion, I guess... You look pretty strong, but be careful.
NP_p0900_0700_10010_DOC:
I know, I've heard.
I don't like what we're up against... Be sure you've got everything you need.
NP_p0900_1200_10010_DOC: It's going to take some time before we're fully mobilized and ready to take on full investigations.
NP_p0900_ME09_00010_HAT: You want to know about Co-op play? No problem.
NP_p0900_0600_00020_ALI: What, you think I'm gonna let ol' Jin have all the fun?
NP_p0900_0800_10110_DOC: Glad to see you've made your amends. Try and stay out of trouble, okay?
NP_p0900_ME05_10060_HAT: Different Abilities take up different numbers of slots, so keep an eye on how many you have left!
NP_p0900_0301_10010_DOC:
I know you've been through a lot.
But try to keep moving forward, okay?
NP_P0900_0290_10030_ALA: You're tellin' me they gave a stinkin' rookie a Legatus before the one and only Alan King!? Well, I'm still the best!
NP_p0900_0901_00020_KIJ: At this rate, it's only a matter of time before Jena catches up to it. We're all counting on you to save him!
NP_p0900_0201_00110_JOE:
She asks if you found him.
If you did, get your ass to the training room! That's from me, not her.
NP_p0900_0400_00020_JIN: ... No, I can't let myself go down that road. The captain wouldn't let one setback stop him.
NP_p0900_0300_10010_RIC: The Legion system isn't perfect, after all... Perhaps chimeras are too great a force for us to harness.
NP_p0900_0600_10110_TAB:
Oddly quiet today...
Kinda feels like the calm before the storm.
NP_p0900_0500_10020_KAY: Don't let your limiter gauge run out during a fight. Chimeras won't wait for your Legion to cool down.
NP_p0900_0400_00010_KIJ: Looks like you're heading to Harmony Square to collect info. It's a lively shopping area.
NP_p0900_0600_00020_BIL: You know when I'll have a nice, peaceful day? When the last chimera's dead. Not a second sooner.
NP_p0900_0300_10010_E00:
Look at you, buddy, already back to work!
Don't worry, we're all here for ya!
NP_p0900_1200_10110_OPE: I'm busting my butt as interim commander over here, you know! ... Oh, okay, a little break should be fine.
NP_p0900_0400_10110_HAT: Another emergency, huh... At least you can't say we're not earning our salary around here.
NP_p0900_0501_10030_JOE: Give me a firing range and I can blast my cares straight away, kapow!
NP_p0900_0600_00020_ALA: If you get rusty and give up, where's that leave me? Now, if you're thinking of handing over your Legion, that's different!
NP_p0900_0500_00010_TED:
I heard a lot went down at Ark Mall.
See, you can never be too careful!
NP_p0900_0302_00010_DOC: Make sure you have everything you need before heading out.
NP_p0900_0900_00210_TAB: Are you sure you're ready to take her on? Hurry back if you change your mind!
NP_p0900_0900_10010_TAB: How about a couple more last-minute weapon modifications before your big, decisive battle?
NP_p0900_0401_10020_TAB: That Jena chick has Legion cores, right? I hear those are pretty much chimeras.
NP_p0900_0900_00010_COM: Whatever Jena's motivations may be, her methodology is... unacceptable.
NP_p0900_0800_10010_OPE:
Hey, somebody's gotta do the dirty work.
Who knows, you might like it!
NP_p0900_0301_10030_ALA: This is what they give us instead of Legions.
NP_p0900_0501_10020_OPE:
... Okay, I'm done.
Don't you have any work to do, Marie?
NP_P0900_0290_10030_BIL:
Actually, hang on. That Legion you've got?
It's just a leashed chimera. Watch your back.
NP_p0900_0600_10020_MIK: Don't you worry. I'll be sure to land on my feet next time we've gotta jump to action!
NP_p0900_ME05_00020_HAT: That's where you go to equip your Legion with Ability Codes.
NP_p0900_0300_00010_MIT: Hey... Are you feeling all right? You're taking this all a lot better than I would, that's for sure...
NP_p0900_0400_10020_SHI: Tell any spirits you happen across, too...
NP_p0900_0501_10020_JUL: You know... Is there a Mrs. Lappy? A litter of puppies? Anyone?
NP_p0900_ME04_10040_HAT: To change skills, pick a skill from the list, and then choose which skill you want to swap it out for.
NP_P0900_0290_00030_MIK: I'd love to talk wild kingdom with you, but no time for that right now. See you 'round!
NP_p0900_ME08_00030_HAT: "Fully upgrade your X-Baton," "Add 25 people to your database," things like that.
NP_p0900_1200_10020_POL: I gotta say, Olive sure does keep me busy... But at least she acknowledges I exist, unlike certain former commanders...
NP_p0900_0600_10010_MIK: Nothing's going on... I feel like I might just curl up for a little cat nap.
NP_p0900_0200_10210_DOC:
No?
Well, let me know if you need anything.
NP_p0900_0200_00010_DOC:
Welcome to Neuron.
If you need any medical supplies, don't hesitate to ask.
NP_p0900_0500_00010_LEO:
Jena hurt Akira so badly...
She's got to be a chimera, right? She's inhuman!
NP_p0900_0501_10010_JUL:
Lappy, lately I've been wondering...
Do you have any friends or family?
NP_p0900_ME14_10030_HAT: Anything you haven't saved gets tossed out, so it's a good idea to check your log first, and save if you have to!
NP_p0900_0202_10010_E00: Hey, your briefing upstairs all done with already?
NP_p0900_0201_10010_MIK:
So was the captain mad?
People are harder to read than animals.
NP_p0900_1200_10010_POL: Oh, hello there! How's your paperwork coming along?
NP_p0900_ME05_00010_HAT: Oh, you're interested in the Abilities screen?
NP_p0900_0300_00020_MIT: But if you're not feeling well, you can always come talk to me. I'm... in here a lot.
NP_p0900_0400_10010_SHI: If you meet any members of the Ark Occult Society in Harmony Square, tell them HighPriestess42 sends her regards...
NP_p0900_0300_10020_RIC: But like the commander, I also sense potential in you.
NP_p0900_0600_10120_TAB: Ah, sorry, I guess that sounded ominous. You know what they say about idle hands. Quick, show me that X-Baton!
NP_p0900_0901_00010_KIJ: How're you holding up? We're keeping an eye on the commander's helicopter from here.
NP_p0900_0400_00010_JIN: If only I'd been stronger, I could've...
NP_p0900_0400_00020_KIJ: Be sure to use your IRIS if something catches your eye! It'll help you keep all your info organized.
NP_p0900_0500_10010_KAY: As if chimeras weren't enough, now there's a new giant monster running around, too. You holding up okay?
NP_p0900_0600_00010_BIL: All this calm's making everyone too soft. Don't forget there are still chimeras out there somewhere.
NP_p0900_0400_10030_TED:
All set? Good.
Don't keep everybody waitin' too long...
NP_p0900_0202_00010_MIT: The police need our help, huh... Better make sure I don't make things worse...
NP_p0900_0201_00010_ALA: You may have impressed the commander, but you've got a long way to go before you catch up with THE Alan King!
NP_p0900_0900_00020_COM: Failure is not an option this time. You must stop her, by whatever means necessary. Our future depends on it.
NP_p0900_0501_10010_LIF:
Taking a break.
A bit tired.
NP_p0900_0401_10010_TAB: Hey, you never know when a violent perp might appear! Better tune that gear up, just in case!
NP_p0900_ME07_10030_HAT: It's got info on your rank, health, and attack power, as well as your X-Baton and Legatus levels.
NP_p0900_0800_10020_OPE: Some people find cleaning relaxing, you know! The worst is over for now, so take it easy out there.
NP_p0900_0200_00210_HAT: If you want to know more about your Legatus Menu, just ask.
NP_p0900_0501_10010_OPE: Well hello there, Lappy! Your fur is looking nice and lustrous today!
NP_p0900_0201_00010_BIL:
Find the captain yet?
Unless you need something else, give me some space, would ya?
NP_p0900_0901_10110_HAT: Well, I think I've done just about all I can. The rest is up to you.
NP_p0900_0200_10010_HAT:
What is it?
Something you want to ask me?
NP_p0900_0500_00020_TED: Some kind of unidentified lifeform, yeah? Well, lucky for you, it all blows up the same!
NP_p0900_0600_00010_ALA: Well, don't you look all breezy and carefree? You'd better not be taking it too easy! I need my rival to stay sharp!
NP_p0900_ME06_00050_HAT: If you've got lots of Legions, put them in a marching order that feels right to you!
NP_p0900_1200_10010_SHI: Since you first bonded with your Legion, have you seen things you couldn't see before?
NP_p0900_0203_10110_HAT: I know it's your first mission and all, but try to relax.
NP_p0900_0201_00010_LEO: Is everything okay with Alicia and the captain? I hope he wasn't upset with her for something...
NP_p0900_1200_10030_SYN: I remember following Brenda to the ARI, but everything after that is all... fuzzy. Something about clones...
NP_p0900_0400_10010_POL:
Should I go to the command room, too?
I've almost got this sparkling...
NP_P0900_0290_10010_SHI: Ah, here you are. Just as the cards foretold...
NP_p0900_ORD1_01010_BIL: You're getting pretty good at beating chimeras, but there's still way too many of 'em out there.
NP_p0900_0901_10020_POL: ... Oh, right! Everyone here at the station is fine!
NP_p0900_ORD0_02020_POL: Here. I'm sure this'll be a big help, whether you're saving kitties, or doing some other work that's almost as important!
NP_p0900_0302_10020_OPE: Did Lappy give you the grand tour? This is your new home, after all. Better get used to it!
NP_p0900_ME00_00030_HAT: It's got a map, and information about your items, and it keeps track of you and your Legion's stats, too.
NP_p0900_0202_00010_ROY:
The commander's calling.
We should head to the command room ASAP.
NP_p0900_0700_00120_DOC: Be sure to take plenty of medical supplies.
NP_p0900_0600_00010_LEO: It's so quiet... I think I forgot what it's like to not be worried about anything. ... Should I be worried about that?
NP_p0900_ME11_10010_HAT: Interested in the System screen's Help tab? Well, that's what I'm here for.
NP_p0900_ME01_10050_HAT: That's about it for the Map screen. Get in the habit of checking it when you're in the field.
NP_p0900_ORD1_00030_BIL: That should come in handy for you. Now get back out there.
NP_p0900_0500_10010_MIK: A giant creature that can absorb chimeras... Could it be a new species? Imagine that!
NP_p0900_0200_10010_JUL: If you're looking for the captain, he took the elevator just now... With Alicia... Ohh, could it be?!
NP_p0900_0500_00010_ALA: Heard you went through a lot today. I guess I can let you slide this once.
NP_p0900_0300_00120_ALA: Yeah, thought so. Gotta say I don't see what the big deal is about you. You can't even tell me where Marie is.
NP_p0900_1200_10120_HAT: Might take a little spiritual journey, y'know? Find myself out there and all that.
NP_p0900_ORD2_11010_RIC: Collected more chimera data, have you? Let's see what you've got for me now!
NP_p0900_0201_10010_KAY: Oh yeah, if you find any interesting data out there, show it to me when you get back, okay?
NP_p0900_0300_10010_AVE:
Wow, that is one morose mug!
When you're feeling down, it's time to drink up!
NP_p0900_0300_00010_JOE: Can't believe those damn things got the captain... But we gotta keep it moving.
NP_p0900_0203_00110_DOC: We can take care of any minor injuries here, so don't hold back out there.
NP_p0900_0501_10010_HAT:
Hey Ma—I mean, Lappy.
Can I help you with something?
NP_p0900_ME13_00030_HAT: Any progress you've made on that File will be reset if you give it up. It'll be like you never started it at all!
NP_P0900_0290_00020_KIJ:
I'm Kijima, from the tech crew.
It's our job to keep all the equipment in working order.
NP_p0900_ME03_00070_HAT: A Legion's C-Scale goes up as it learns more skills, so be sure to teach it plenty!
NP_p0900_0500_00010_BIL: You saw Jena's arm close up, right?
NP_p0900_0200_10010_OPE:
Sorry, but I'm really busy right now.
Let's talk later, ok?
NP_p0900_ORD0_10040_POL:
You have to save them!
... Um, if that's okay with you, I mean.
NP_p0900_0300_10010_TAB: At a time like this, you need gear that can handle anything, right?
NP_p0900_1200_00020_KIJ: Ideally we'd issue everyone on the Ark an IRIS of their own, but that's not realistic at this point in development...
NP_p0900_ORD2_10030_RIC: .... At any rate, take this as a token of my thanks.
NP_p0900_ME02_10010_HAT: Want to know about the Item screen? Well, it's pretty important, so listen close.
NP_p0900_0300_00010_COM: I've had a special routine prepared for you in the Training Room.
NP_p0900_ME12_10050_HAT: Make sure you check your save data log so you know what you're loading yourself into first!
NP_p0900_1200_00010_JIN: Look at you, still hard at work. That's good. Max wouldn't want you to rest on your laurels.
NP_p0900_0600_10010_KAY: Another day, another dull inventory check. If you find any interesting items in the field, don't hold out on me, okay?
NP_p0900_ORD2_11020_RIC:
Amazing! Even more wonderful than before!
This data is great but.... I need more!
NP_P0900_0290_00030_KAY: It keeps me chained to this desk, so if you can bring me any useful data from the real world, I'd appreciate it.
NP_p0900_0201_10020_KAY: Don't forget to swing by the infirmary for medical supplies. Can't bring my data back if you're dead, right?
NP_p0900_0300_10020_AVE: ... I'm talking about energy drinks! Come on, we're on the clock, y'know!
NP_p0900_0300_00020_JOE: More field work coming, means more chances to let off some steam, too! Blaow, blaow!
NP_p0900_0600_10210_TED:
Yeah, all right, drop by again soon.
All this peace and quiet's not gonna last forever!
NP_p0900_0300_00110_ALA: You again? If it's not about Marie, I don't care.
NP_p0900_0500_00020_ALA: Besides, with all these new threats going around, my time to shine is just around the corner.
NP_p0900_0600_00010_TED:
All right, you want toys, I'm your man.
Check these out.
NP_p0900_1200_10110_HAT: Think I'll go on vacation soon. As busy as we've been around here, I could use a break.
NP_p0900_0300_00010_ROY:
Captain Howard...
To think the Legions would turn on him, just like that...
NP_p0900_0700_10110_HAT: Sounds like things are pretty hairy out there. Maybe give your Abilities a once-over before you go?
NP_p0900_0203_10010_SHI: Heading to a scene sends chills down my spine! That agonizing thrill... The, um, thrill of a job well done, of course...
NP_p0900_1200_00030_KAY: Okay, get this: Neuron should work together with the private sector to produce a line of licensed chimera repellent items!
NP_p0900_0800_00210_HAT: All good? Well, there's a lot of cleanup waiting...
NP_p0900_0500_00020_BIL:
She's not human, she's a chimera!
If you meet her again, you take her out on sight!
NP_p0900_ME02_10020_HAT: The Item screen will show you all the items you're carrying, what they do, and how many you've got.
NP_p0900_0300_10020_TAB: While you were under, I whipped up an X-Baton upgrade to give y'all a bit more punch.
NP_p0900_1200_00010_KIJ: Just because people know that chimeras exist now doesn't mean they can see them.
NP_p0900_1200_00020_JIN: Man, I wish your dad were here to see his kids totally surpass me. He would LOVE that.
NP_p0900_0700_00010_KIJ: We'll be providing support for everyone out on call. Can't take any chances.
NP_p0900_0900_00110_TED: I've got plenty of toys set aside for a day like this. Take a look! I'm sure you'll find something you like.
NP_p0900_0201_00010_TED:
Cap'n doesn't wanna play, huh? 
Welp, enjoy your training anyway!
NP_p0900_0501_10020_HAT: You want to help me? Sorry, but nothing comes to mind right now. Ask someone else.
NP_p0900_0800_10010_HAT: It's a little quieter lately... Need something?
NP_p0900_ME03_00040_HAT: Just remember, you can only unlock skills and traits that are connected to something already learned.
NP_P0900_0290_00010_KIJ:
I've heard about you.
Welcome to Neuron.
NP_p0900_0901_10010_POL:
Oh, great! It's so good to see you back safe...
Um, are you hurt? You seem worn out...
NP_P0900_0290_10020_SHI: The Fool indicates new beginnings. The Lovers, new bonds. But beyond that, the cards keep their secrets...
NP_p0900_0800_10210_DOC:
Alright then, take care.
Doctor Calvert has high hopes for you, you know. Please don't disappoint him.
NP_p0900_ORD1_01020_BIL: Take this. Hit 'em hard for me, okay?
NP_p0900_0202_10010_TAB: Heading out again? We'd better start making space for whatever y'all break next!
NP_p0900_ORD0_02010_POL: The shelter's getting livelier, but I still see lots of poor, helpless little cats out there...
NP_p0900_0302_10010_OPE:

NP_p0900_0400_00020_DOC: It sounded fairly urgent. You shouldn't waste time.
